diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: eczema, tinea, alopecia areata, lupus erythematosus, sarcoidosis, chronic acneiform eruptions
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of follicular mucinosis was based on the patient's history of hairless pruritic papules, the family history of benign idiopathic follicular mucinosis, and skin biopsy findings showing follicular spongiosis and mucinosis with a sparse perifollicular infiltrate of small lymphocytes.
